rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04}

description: This unit covers theoretical and practical knowledge of groundwater hydrology, emphasizing analytical and numerical modelling skills.The unit includes: aquifer properties, Darcy's law, well hydraulics, analytical and numerical modelling, model calibration, uncertainty analysis, contaminant fate and transport, variable density flow and ground water flow in unsaturated soils.The knowledge learnt from this unit is directly applicable to research projects and practical industrial problems.
